column4: Does nautilus or gnome do something different or in addition to "mount" when detecting a device?
nautilus scans the device and shows it to you
Would that be something I can do manually?
No, wait, that's maybe not the right question. Does nautilus/gnomge register the device in some way to make it known to applications?
of course you can stop that feature going to the nautilus menu edit ->preferences -> (removable drives?)
